00011 // To match an image with the Standard catalogue
00012 
00013 
00014 typedef enum StandardColor {NONE, VBAND, BBAND, UBAND, RBAND, IBAND};
00015 
00016 
00017 class StandardStar : public BaseStar {
00018 
00019 public :
00020 
00021   double airmass; 
00022   double fluxpersec;
00023   double efluxpersec;
00024   int flag;
00025   StandardColor color;
00026 
00027   StandardStar();
00028   StandardStar(double xx, double yy, double ff); 
00029 
00030   string Name() const {return name;};
00031   double AirMass() const {return airmass;};
00032   double FluxPerSec() const {return fluxpersec;};
00033   int Flag() const {return flag;};
00034   double Ra() const {return RaStringToDeg(ra);};
00035   double Dec() const {return DecStringToDeg(dec);};
00036 
00037   double BVmag() const {return bvmag;};
00038   double UBmag() const {return ubmag;};
00039   double VRmag() const {return vrmag;};
00040   double RImag() const {return rimag;};
00041   double VImag() const {return vimag;};
00042 
00043 
00044   double Vmag() const {return vmag;};
00045   double Bmag() const {return vmag + bvmag;};
00046   double Umag() const {return vmag + bvmag + ubmag;};
00047   double Rmag() const {return vmag - vrmag;};
00048   double Imag() const {return vmag - vimag;};
00049 
00050   double dVmag() const {return dvmag;};
00051   double dBmag() const {return sqrt(dvmag*dvmag + dbvmag*dbvmag);};
00052   double dUmag() const {return sqrt(dvmag*dvmag + dbvmag*dbvmag + dubmag*dubmag);};
00053   double dRmag() const {return sqrt(dvmag*dvmag + dvrmag*dvrmag);};
00054   double dImag() const {return sqrt(dvmag*dvmag + dvimag*dvimag);};
00055 
00056   double Magnitude(const StandardColor couleur);
00057   double Magnitude();
00058   double eMagnitude(const StandardColor couleur);
00059   double eMagnitude();
00060   double DeltaColor();
00061 
00063   virtual void    Read(istream& r, const char *Format); 
00064 
00066 
00067   static StandardStar* read(istream& r, const char *Format); 
00068

00071

00074 
00076   virtual void    dump(ostream& s = cout) const ;
00077   
00079   virtual void    writen(ostream& s = cout) const ;
00080 
00082   virtual void    write(ostream& s= cout)  const ;
